statements: SELECT * FROM MentalHealthLibrary;
SELECT resource_title, author_name FROM MentalHealthLibrary;
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthLibrary WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT resource_title FROM MentalHealthLibrary WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT resource_id, resource_title FROM MentalHealthLibrary ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthLibrary WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT resource_title, author_name FROM MentalHealthLibrary WHERE publication_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthLibrary WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication FROM MentalHealthLibrary;
SELECT resource_title, publication_date FROM MentalHealthLibrary WHERE is_verified = TRUE ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, category FROM resources WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT article_title, author, published_date FROM articles WHERE author IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM articles WHERE published_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT resource_name, category, content FROM resources ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE resource_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, content FROM resources WHERE category = 'Technology' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT resource_name, category FROM resources WHERE category IN ('Software', 'Hardware') AND created_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT article_title, author, published_date FROM articles WHERE author LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY published_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM resources JOIN articles ON resources.resource_id = articles.article_id WHERE resources.resource_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM resources;
SELECT title, author, category FROM resources WHERE category = 'Science';
SELECT id, author FROM articles WHERE publish_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, role FROM staff WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT id, title, author FROM articles ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT id, title FROM resources WHERE category='Science' ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT author, content FROM articles WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM staff WHERE role='Manager' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT title, author FROM resources WHERE title LIKE '%database%' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT name, role, email FROM staff WHERE phone LIKE '+1%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT resource_name, content FROM staff_resources
SELECT * FROM resource_tags
SELECT DISTINCT tag_name FROM resource_tags
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, rating FROM resource_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_resources WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM staff_resources WHERE staff_id = 1
SELECT resource_name, content FROM patient_resources WHERE patient_id = 10 ORDER BY resource_name ASC
SELECT r.resource_name, t.tag_name FROM staff_resources r INNER JOIN resource_tags t ON r.resource_id = t.resource_id WHERE t.tag_name = 'medical'
SELECT r.resource_name, avg(rr.rating) AS avg_rating FROM staff_resources r INNER JOIN resource_reviews rr ON r.resource_id = rr.resource_id GROUP BY r.resource_name HAVING avg_rating > 4
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, COUNT(resource_id) AS resource_count FROM patient_resources GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY resource_count DESC
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthResources;
SELECT resource_title, author, category FROM MentalHealthResources WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT content FROM MentalHealthResources WHERE category IS NULL;
SELECT staff_name, role FROM Staff ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM MentalHealthResources WHERE category = 'Therapy' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT resource_title, author, publication_date FROM MentalHealthResources WHERE author LIKE 'Dr.%' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT article_title, author FROM Articles WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT staff_name, role, department FROM Staff WHERE role = 'Psychologist' AND department = 'Mental Health';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
